channel.title: Smart Mod Crash Error
channel.description: When I want to make a mk2 converter, I get a crash error. This problem goes away when the mod is deleted. How can I solve this problem?

item.title: Smart Mod Crash Error
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

It also happens with big pillars…

Read full topic

item.title: Smart Mod Crash Error
item.dc:creator: @Marek_Hraba Marek Hraba
item.description:
@Marek_Hraba wrote:

The problem still persists, when I select bottom side of the pillar, it’s just crashes to desktop. I didn’t test other building parts, but I know it’s still broken… well… maybe an error from the log could help solve the problem?

item.title: Smart Mod Crash Error
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin_McDaniel Benjamin Mc Daniel
item.description:
@Benjamin_McDaniel wrote:

Still broken when selecting a foundation or copying a building. Freeze crash every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Smart Mod Crash Error
item.dc:creator: @Elime_De_La_Video Elimé De La Video
item.description:
@Elime_De_La_Video wrote:

Smart has been updated. I don’t really have time to test it out right now but if you do, please tell me if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Smart Mod Crash Error
item.dc:creator: @Elime_De_La_Video Elimé De La Video
item.description:
@Elime_De_La_Video wrote:

Yea same for me but the crashes occur whenever I try to select a foundation in the Builder tool. I figured that it was when Smart was installed. I guess it’s because of the patch that got released earlier today and the mod isn’t updated yet. The problem here is pretty similar so it’s probably just about waiting for the mods to get updated for this patch.

Read full topic
